homePage.heroSection.heading: Get behind the wheel and boost your income
homePage.heroSection.subHeading: Join our growing fleet and enjoy the easiest way to be financially independent with a path to vehicle ownership at same time.
homePage.heroSection.feature1.title: Work With Multiple Clients
homePage.heroSection.feature2.title: Access to Vehicle Financing
homePage.heroSection.feature2.content: Fast credit scoring decision within 48 hours
homePage.heroSection.feature3.title: Easy Repayments
homePage.heroSection.feature3.content: Affordable financial services with path to ownership
homePage.heroSection.feature4.title: Flexible working hours
homePage.heroSection.feature4.content: Set a suitable working times for you
homePage.boxesSection.heading: Few steps to be a CAPTAIN and start earning with us
homePage.boxesSection.box1.title: Sign Up
homePage.boxesSection.box1.content: We need few information about you, and our team will contact you in 2 days.
homePage.boxesSection.box2.title: Get Verified
homePage.boxesSection.box2.content: All our captains have to pass our verification process, check the Captains page to know the eligibility criteria.
homePage.boxesSection.box3.title: Choose your Vehicle
homePage.boxesSection.box3.content: Using our smart calculator, you can estimate your weekly earnings and choose a suitable car with a flexible financing plan.
homePage.boxesSection.box4.title: Drive and Own
homePage.boxesSection.box4.content: You will pay a weekly amount deducted from your earnings based on a up to 36 months plan with a clear path ownership.
homePage.boxesSection.chooseBox.title: Choose your Vehicle
homePage.boxesSection.chooseBox.content: Using our smart calculator, you will soon be able to estimate your earnings, choose your most suitable vehicles with flexible financing plan.
homePage.enterpriseSection.title: Enterprise?
homePage.enterpriseSection.subtitle: Enjoy our Fleet-As-A-Solution
homePage.enterpriseSection.content: Join our growing fleet and enjoy the easiest way to be financially independent with a path to vehicle ownership at same time.
homePage.infoSection.info1.title: Women Empowrment
homePage.infoSection.info1.content: We are committed to helping women become successful businessowners and to be self-sufficient.
homePage.infoSection.info2.title: Environmentally friendly
homePage.infoSection.info2.content: Our commitment to building a productive hybrid and electric fleet in the world, and positively contributing to a more sustainable world.
homePage.infoSection.info3.title: Financial independency
homePage.infoSection.info3.content: With our financial solution, captains can access vehicle financing, thus allowing them to be more productive and financially independent.
homePage.infoSection.info4.title: Sustainability
homePage.infoSection.info4.content: Our ultimate goal is to achieve sustainability through maintaining the quality of our services and establishing a high-quality partnership with high reliability.
